long_description: Designed for The North Face athletes competing in the Ultra-Trail du Mont-Blanc mountain race, the technical, close-fitting UTMB gloves provide warmth and breathability for highly aerobic activities. Apex ClimateBlock fabric at the backs of the hands and palms does an excellent job of shedding water and blocking wind while maintaining a comfortable level of breathability. Fabric is ideal for running, trekking, skiing and snowshoeing in challenging, inclement weather. 5 Dimensional Fit(TM) uses 5 measurements of the hand to construct gloves with an accurate and consistent fit. Radiametric Articulation(TM) improves warmth and blood flow to your fingers by mirroring the natural relaxed curve of the hand. The North Face UTMB gloves have reinforcement between the thumbs and index fingers to add durability to a high-wear area.
